welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tourcoing, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
